dt2.1:1.1.pli: Rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?

dt2.1:1.2.pli: Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.

dt2.1:1.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:2.1.pli: Vedanākkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?

dt2.1:2.2.pli: Vedanākkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.

dt2.1:2.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:3.1.pli: Saññākkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?

dt2.1:3.2.pli: Saññākkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.

dt2.1:3.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:4.1.pli: Saṅkhārakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?

dt2.1:4.2.pli: Saṅkhārakkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.

dt2.1:4.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:5.1.pli: Viññāṇakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?

dt2.1:5.2.pli: Viññāṇakkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.

dt2.1:5.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:7.1.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:7.2.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:7.4.pli: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:8.2.pli: dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:8.4.pli: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:9.2.pli: dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:9.4.pli: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:10.2.pli: dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:10.4.pli: Tīhi khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:12.1.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:12.2.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:12.4.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:13.1.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca …pe…

dt2.1:13.2.pli: tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:13.4.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:14.1.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca …pe…

dt2.1:14.2.pli: tīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:14.4.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:16.1.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:16.2.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:16.4.pli: Ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:17.1.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca …pe…

dt2.1:17.2.pli: catūhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:17.4.pli: Ekena khandhena, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:19.1.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:19.2.pli: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:19.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:20.1.pli: Pañcakkhandhā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:20.2.pli: Pañcakkhandhā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:20.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:22.1.pli: Cakkhāyatanaṃ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ?

dt2.1:22.2.pli: Cakkhāyatanaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:22.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:23.1.pli: Sotāyatanaṃ … ghānāyatanaṃ … jivhāyatanaṃ … kāyāyatanaṃ … rūpāyatanaṃ … saddāyatanaṃ … gandhāyatanaṃ … rasāyatanaṃ …

dt2.1:23.3.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:23.5.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:24.1.pli: Manāyatanaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:24.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:25.1.pli: Dhammāyatanaṃ asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:25.3.pli: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:27.1.pli: Cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:27.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:28.1.pli: Cakkhāyatanañca ghānāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca jivhāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca rūpāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca saddāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca gandhāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca rasāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:28.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:29.1.pli: Cakkhāyatanañca manāyatanañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:29.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:30.1.pli: Cakkhāyatanañca dhammāyatanañca asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:30.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:32.1.pli: Dvādasāyatanāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:32.2.pli: Dvādasāyatanāni asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:32.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:34.1.pli: Cakkhudhātu katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:34.2.pli: Cakkhudhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:34.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:35.1.pli: Sotadhātu … ghānadhātu … jivhādhātu … kāyadhātu … rūpadhātu … saddadhātu … gandhadhātu … rasadhātu … phoṭṭhabbadhātu … cakkhuviññāṇadhātu … sotaviññāṇadhātu … ghānaviññāṇadhātu … jivhāviññāṇadhātu … kāyaviññāṇadhātu … manodhātu … manoviññāṇadhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:35.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:36.1.pli: Dhammadhātu asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:36.3.pli: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:38.1.pli: Cakkhudhātu ca sotadhātu ca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:38.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:39.1.pli: Cakkhudhātu ca ghānadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca jivhādhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca kāyadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca rūpadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca saddadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca gandhadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca rasadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca phoṭṭhabbadhātu ca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:39.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:40.1.pli: Cakkhudhātu ca cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:40.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:41.1.pli: Cakkhudhātu ca sotaviññāṇadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca ghānaviññāṇadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca jivhāviññāṇadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca kāyaviññāṇadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca manodhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:41.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:42.1.pli: Cakkhudhātu ca dhammadhātu ca asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:42.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:44.1.pli: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:44.2.pli: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:44.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:46.1.pli: Dukkhasaccaṃ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ?

dt2.1:46.2.pli: Dukkhasaccaṃ pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:46.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:47.1.pli: Samudayasaccaṃ … maggasaccaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:47.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:48.1.pli: Nirodhasaccaṃ na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:48.3.pli: Pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:50.1.pli: Dukkhasaccañca samudayasaccañca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:50.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:51.1.pli: Dukkhasaccañca maggasaccañca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:51.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:52.1.pli: Dukkhasaccañca nirodhasaccañca asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:52.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:54.1.pli: Dukkhasaccañca samudayasaccañca maggasaccañca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:54.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:55.1.pli: Dukkhasaccañca samudayasaccañca nirodhasaccañca asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:55.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:57.1.pli: Dukkhasaccañca samudayasaccañca maggasaccañca nirodhasaccañca asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:57.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:58.1.pli: Cattāri saccāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni?

dt2.1:58.2.pli: Cattāri saccāni asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni.

dt2.1:58.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitāni.

dt2.1:60.1.pli: Cakkhundriyaṃ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ?

dt2.1:60.2.pli: Cakkhundriyaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:60.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:61.1.pli: Sotindriyaṃ … ghānindriyaṃ … jivhindriyaṃ … kāyindriyaṃ … itthindriyaṃ … purisindriyaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:61.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:62.1.pli: Manindriyaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:62.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:63.1.pli: Jīvitindriyaṃ dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:63.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:64.1.pli: Sukhindriyaṃ … dukkhindriyaṃ … somanassindriyaṃ … domanassindriyaṃ … upekkhindriyaṃ … saddhindriyaṃ … vīriyindriyaṃ … satindriyaṃ … samādhindriyaṃ … paññindriyaṃ … anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ … aññindriyaṃ … aññātāvindriyaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:64.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:66.1.pli: Cakkhundriyañca sotindriyañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:66.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:67.1.pli: Cakkhundriyañca ghānindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca jivhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca kāyindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca itthindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca purisindriyañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:67.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:68.1.pli: Cakkhundriyañca manindriyañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:68.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:69.1.pli: Cakkhundriyañca jīvitindriyañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:69.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:70.1.pli: Cakkhundriyañca sukhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca dukkhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca somanassindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca domanassindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca saddhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca vīriyindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca satindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca samādhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca paññindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca aññindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca aññātāvindriyañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:70.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:72.1.pli: Bāvīsatindriyāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni?

dt2.1:72.2.pli: Bāvīsatindriyāni catūhi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni.

dt2.1:72.4.pli: Ekena khandhena pañcahāyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitāni.

dt2.1:73.1.pli: Avijjā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:73.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:74.1.pli: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:74.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:75.1.pli: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:75.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:76.1.pli: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:76.3.pli: Ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:77.1.pli: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ dvīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:77.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:78.1.pli: Saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso … phassapaccayā vedanā … vedanāpaccayā taṇhā … taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ … kammabhavo ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.

dt2.1:78.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:79.1.pli: Upapattibhavo … kāmabhavo … saññābhavo … pañcavokārabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.

dt2.1:79.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:80.1.pli: Rūpabhavo pañcahi khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.

dt2.1:80.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi sattahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:81.1.pli: Arūpabhavo … nevasaññānāsaññābhavo … catuvokārabhavo catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahito.

dt2.1:81.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:82.1.pli: Asaññābhavo … ekavokārabhavo ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahito.

dt2.1:82.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:83.1.pli: Jāti dvīhi khandhehi … jarā dvīhi khandhehi … maraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:83.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:84.1.pli: Soko … paridevo … dukkhaṃ … domanassaṃ … upāyāso … satipaṭṭhānaṃ … sammappadhānaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:84.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:85.1.pli: Iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahito.

dt2.1:85.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:86.1.pli: Jhānaṃ dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:86.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:87.1.pli: Appamaññā … pañcindriyāni … pañca balāni … satta bojjhaṅgā … ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo … phasso … vedanā … saññā … cetanā … adhimokkho … manasikāro ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.

dt2.1:87.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.

dt2.1:88.1.pli: Cittaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:88.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṃ.

dt2.1:89.1.pli: Kusalā dhammā … akusalā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:89.2.pli: Kusalā dhammā … akusalā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:89.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:90.1.pli: Abyākatā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:90.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:91.1.pli: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā … dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:91.3.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:92.1.pli: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:92.3.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:93.1.pli: Vipākā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:93.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:94.1.pli: Vipākadhammadhammā … saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:94.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:95.1.pli: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:95.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:96.1.pli: Upādinnupādāniyā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:96.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:97.1.pli: Anupādinnupādāniyā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:97.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:98.1.pli: Anupādinnaanupādāniyā dhammā … asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:98.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:99.1.pli: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:99.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:100.1.pli: Savitakkasavicārā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:100.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:101.1.pli: Avitakkavicāramattā dhammā … pītisahagatā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:101.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:102.1.pli: Avitakkaavicārā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:102.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:103.1.pli: Sukhasahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:103.3.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:104.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:104.3.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:105.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā … ācayagāmino dhammā … apacayagāmino dhammā … sekkhā dhammā … asekkhā dhammā … mahaggatā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:105.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:106.1.pli: Neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā … nevācayagāmināpacayagāmino dhammā … nevasekkhanāsekkhā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:106.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:107.1.pli: Parittā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:107.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:108.1.pli: Appamāṇā dhammā … paṇītā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:108.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:109.1.pli: Parittārammaṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:109.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:110.1.pli: Mahaggatārammaṇā dhammā … appamāṇārammaṇā dhammā … hīnā dhammā … micchattaniyatā dhammā … sammattaniyatā dhammā … maggārammaṇā dhammā … maggahetukā dhammā … maggādhipatino dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:110.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:111.1.pli: Majjhimā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:111.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:112.1.pli: Aniyatā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:112.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:113.1.pli: Uppannā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:113.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:114.1.pli: Anuppannā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:114.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:115.1.pli: Uppādino dhammā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:115.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:116.1.pli: Atītā dhammā … anāgatā dhammā … paccuppannā dhammā … ajjhattā dhammā … ajjhattabahiddhā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:116.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:117.1.pli: Bahiddhā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:117.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:118.1.pli: Atītārammaṇā dhammā … anāgatārammaṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:118.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:119.1.pli: Paccuppannārammaṇā dhammā … ajjhattārammaṇā dhammā … bahiddhārammaṇā dhammā … ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:119.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:120.1.pli: Sanidassanasappaṭighā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:120.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:121.1.pli: Anidassanasappaṭighā dhammā ekena khandhena navahāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:121.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi tīhāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:122.1.pli: Anidassanaappaṭighā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:122.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi, dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:123.1.pli: Hetū dhammā … hetū ceva sahetukā ca dhammā … hetū ceva hetusampayuttā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:123.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:124.1.pli: Na hetū dhammā … ahetukā dhammā … hetuvippayuttā dhammā … na hetu ahetukā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:124.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:125.1.pli: Sahetukā dhammā … hetusampayuttā dhammā … sahetukā ceva na ca hetu dhammā … hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū dhammā … na hetū sahetukā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:125.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:126.1.pli: Sappaccayā dhammā … saṅkhatā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:126.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:127.1.pli: Appaccayā dhammā … asaṅkhatā dhammā na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:127.3.pli: Pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:128.1.pli: Sanidassanā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:128.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:129.1.pli: Anidassanā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:129.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi, ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:130.1.pli: Sappaṭighā dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:130.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:131.1.pli: Appaṭighā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:131.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi, dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:132.1.pli: Rūpino dhammā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:132.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:133.1.pli: Arūpino dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:133.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:134.1.pli: Lokiyā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:134.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:135.1.pli: Lokuttarā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:135.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:136.1.pli: Kenaci viññeyyā dhammā … kenaci na viññeyyā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:136.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:137.1.pli: Āsavā dhammā … āsavā ceva sāsavā ca dhammā … āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:137.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:138.1.pli: No āsavā dhammā … āsavavippayuttā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:138.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:139.1.pli: Sāsavā dhammā … sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā dhammā … āsavavippayuttā sāsavā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:139.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:140.1.pli: Anāsavā dhammā … āsavavippayuttā anāsavā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:140.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:141.1.pli: Āsavasampayuttā dhammā … āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:141.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:142.1.pli: Saṃyojanā dhammā … ganthā dhammā … oghā dhammā … yogā dhammā … nīvaraṇā dhammā … parāmāsā dhammā … parāmāsā ceva parāmaṭṭhā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:142.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:143.1.pli: No parāmāsā dhammā … parāmāsavippayuttā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:143.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:144.1.pli: Parāmaṭṭhā dhammā … parāmaṭṭhā ceva no ca parāmāsā dhammā … parāmāsavippayuttā parāmaṭṭhā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:144.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:145.1.pli: Aparāmaṭṭhā dhammā … parāmāsavippayuttā aparāmaṭṭhā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:145.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:146.1.pli: Parāmāsasampayuttā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:146.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:147.1.pli: Sārammaṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:147.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:148.1.pli: Anārammaṇā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:148.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:149.1.pli: Cittā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:149.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:150.1.pli: No cittā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:150.3.pli: Ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:151.1.pli: Cetasikā dhammā … cittasampayuttā dhammā … cittasaṃsaṭṭhā dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:151.3.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:152.1.pli: Acetasikā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:152.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:153.1.pli: Cittavippayuttā dhammā … cittavisaṃsaṭṭhā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:153.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:154.1.pli: Cittasamuṭṭhānā dhammā catūhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:154.3.pli: Ekena khandhena chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:155.1.pli: No cittasamuṭṭhānā dhammā … no cittasahabhuno dhammā … no cittānuparivattino dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:155.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:156.1.pli: Cittasahabhuno dhammā … cittānuparivattino dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:156.3.pli: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:157.1.pli: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā dhammā … cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno dhammā … cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:157.3.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:158.1.pli: No cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā dhammā … no cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno dhammā … no cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:158.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:159.1.pli: Ajjhattikā dhammā dvīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:159.3.pli: Tīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:160.1.pli: Bāhirā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:160.3.pli: Ekena khandhena chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:161.1.pli: Upādā dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:161.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:162.1.pli: No upādā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi tīhāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:162.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi navahāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:163.1.pli: Upādinnā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:163.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:164.1.pli: Anupādinnā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:164.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:165.1.pli: Upādānā dhammā … kilesā dhammā … kilesā ceva saṅkilesikā ca dhammā … kilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā ca dhammā … kilesā ceva kilesasampayuttā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:165.3.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:166.1.pli: No kilesā dhammā … asaṅkiliṭṭhā dhammā … kilesavippayuttā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:166.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:167.1.pli: Saṅkilesikā dhammā … saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā … kilesavippayuttā saṅkilesikā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:167.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:168.1.pli: Asaṅkilesikā dhammā … kilesavippayuttā asaṅkilesikā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:168.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:169.1.pli: Saṅkiliṭṭhā dhammā … kilesasampayuttā dhammā … saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā … kilesasampayuttā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:169.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:170.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:170.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:171.1.pli: Na dassanena pahātabbā dhammā … na bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … na dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:171.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:172.1.pli: Savitakkā dhammā … savicārā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:172.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:173.1.pli: Avitakkā dhammā … avicārā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:173.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:174.1.pli: Sappītikā dhammā … pītisahagatā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:174.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:175.1.pli: Appītikā dhammā … na pītisahagatā dhammā … na sukhasahagatā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:175.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:176.1.pli: Sukhasahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:176.3.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:177.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:177.3.pli: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:178.1.pli: Na upekkhāsahagatā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:178.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:179.1.pli: Kāmāvacarā dhammā … pariyāpannā dhammā … sauttarā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:179.3.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:180.1.pli: Na kāmāvacarā dhammā … apariyāpannā dhammā … anuttarā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:180.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:181.1.pli: Rūpāvacarā dhammā … arūpāvacarā dhammā … niyyānikā dhammā … niyatā dhammā … saraṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:181.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:182.1.pli: Na rūpāvacarā dhammā … na arūpāvacarā dhammā … aniyyānikā dhammā … aniyatā dhammā … araṇā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.1:182.2.pli: Araṇā dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.1:182.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
